Name: Super Space Serpent SE
About the game: 80's vector style Twin stick action with a booming soundtrack and permadeath. Super Space Serpent SE is the remake of Super Space Serpent, In this neon immersed world you try to live as long as possible by shooting the aliens that come to attack you, 30+ levels 4 worlds Boss fights In game music player Perma death
